txt.en: This boulder seems strangely out of place here. It appears to have been thrown down and broken...and judging from the skeleton beneath it, it was not an accident.\n\nYou should bring this discovery to the attention of the Rangers of the Grey Company.

'The boulder was thrown down you say? But from where? The place you describe is far from any height from which such a stone could be thrown down and broken.\n\n'I fear you may be right. It appears there may be a greater threat in these hills.'
You found a crushed boulder amid the bluffs of the Gloomglens. It looks to have been thrown to the ground and broken.
Talk to a Ranger at Echad Idhrenfair

There are Rangers at Echad Idhrenfair to the east of the boulder.\n\nYou should bring news of the crushed boulder and skeleton to the Rangers of the Grey Company, for it may portend a greater foe than you have previously encountered.
